title: "Excited Delirium" or "Agitated Delirium” Police Department Training, Whittier, CA

communications.subject: California Public Records Act Request: "Excited Delirium" or "Agitated Delirium” Police Department Training, Whittier, CA
communications.communication:
Hello,

Pursuant to the California Public Records Act I am requesting the following records:

-All current or past training materials for the Whittier Police Department which mention or describe how to handle "excited delirium" or "agitated delirium”.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter in the time frame set out in the CPRA.

Greg Buhl

title: Whittier Misconduct Disclosures to LA District Attorney

communications.subject: California Public Records Act Request: Whittier Misconduct Disclosures to LA District Attorney
communications.communication:
Dear Whittier Police Department,

Pursuant to the California Public Records Act I am requesting the following records:

-A copy of the Whittier PD’s response(s) to Los Angeles District Attorney Gascon’s 2021 request related to officer misconduct infromation.  The request made individually to all law enformecent agenies in Los Angeles County is described in this article, www.latimes.com/california/story/2021-06-20/few-la-police-agencies-have-given-gascon-dishonest-cop-names

I am requesting any letter or email sent in reply ans well as any data transmitted. 
I would imagine most of such data should be covered by SB 1421. This request is for the data as it was produced to the LA District Attorney, with any redactions required by SB 1421.  

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter in the time frame set out in the CPRA.
Greg Buhl
